TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program is one of PC Gamer's Top 100 Greatest PC Games

Articles.Content:

<p>ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s official! PC GamerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s deemed <em>Kerbal Space Program</em> as one of their top 100 greatest PC games. Many of our favorite games are on the list and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re be pleased to be listed among them. More importantly, we hope that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re in your top 100, too.</p>

added clickable image for larger version
Congrats! That's impressive even if you don't consider that KSP isn't finished yet.
It's sure to be higher on their next "Greatest Games" list - let's hope it's a LOT higher!
Congratulations Squad. Rest assured you're in my all-time top 10 :-)
That's amazing SQUAD, and to think all my friends stubbornly refuse to play KSP just to annoy me. I hope KSP becomes even more well known, as it should. I guarantee you're in my top 5.

I'm curious how many in that list are early access, getting in the top 100 for a sciency game is impressive

getting in the top 100 for a game that isn't even finished, that's really impressive.
Made the image clickable for a larger version
It just keeps getting better!
"Release Year: 2013" eh?

I'm curious how many in that list are early access, getting in the top 100 for a sciency game is impressive

getting in the top 100 for a game that isn't even finished, that's really impressive.

Thinking the same thing.

This super software allows either to fool around and/or be serious enough (with the help of the modding community) and still be fun.

holy.... to see KSP right next to assassin's creed II and battlefield 2...those games are finished and had huge (not to mention well paid) dev teams. And KSP is still in developement by basically a group of friends who enjoy space and having a great time. Simply amazing. Way to go SQUAD, keep up the unmatchable work!
Congrats, Squad! Well-deserved. I'm sure you will rank MUCH higher next time! Thanks for the millions upon millions of hours of fun you've given people around the world.

Yeah, baby, yeah!

KSP is definitely in my top five--probably fourth, to be specific--favorite games of all time.
Where can I get a link?

This proves that PC Gamer has no taste.

Should be a lot higher on the list than 90.
Top 100? Definitely in my top 1.

KSP is the game I was looking for when I discovered it, I had already been looking around the web for a good space simulation game off and on for a good 6 month before I found KSP. When I started playing at version 0.15 I felt like they had read my mind. At the time I was finishing my degree in astrophysics and really wanted a game that would let me see and apply some of the basics principles, in a fun and enjoyable way, that I had spent the previous four years learning. There were a few games that promised this but all were too basic, or too myopic or overly complicated and unfinished. This game fit the bill perfectly and I have been playing nearly non stop ever since. The best part is by 0.16 this game had already replaced my long running #1 game Starcraft I which I had been playing since it came out in 1998. I was beginning to wonder if I would ever find something better. Congratulations KSP on being my #1 Game even if PC gamers only thinks your #90.

<p>More importantly, we hope that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re in your top 100, too.</p>

Top 100? Try top 3. And congrats.

Came in here to post this.
best game ever for me

I think it was only a matter of time.

Well done guys!
We all know it should be #1...

Be glad that we got a number like 90, that way we can claim the big box at the top of the page.

But yeah, KSP is definitely in my top three, maybe even top 1. Great work, SQUAD!
